column4: Good morning all.  Can I bother someone with a couple of questions?
I just found out about Ubuntu, and am trying to evaluate it.  So I reboot my laptop with the cd in the drive and the desktop comes up no problems.  But I cannot connect to the net.
ok, what did you do to connect
I mean did u do any kinda settings ...
this will create a connection for you
follow the steps and answer the questions it asks you
you'll be up and running in a minute
dont you want to connect to the net from ubuntu?
so you do that in ubuntu
np, on the main menu go to: Applications > Accessories > Terminal
on the main menu go to: Applications > Accessories > Terminal
forgot to tell you, you might need root previlages inorder to set it up so in the terminal do: sudo pppoeconf then press enter, it will then ask you for the root pass enter it in and your on your way
